locationDescription: Hopin is an all-inclusive online event platform that provides attendees with an interactive, feature-rich experience. Think of it like zoom, slack, and a youtube livestream, combined into a single application.  It includes a stage for talks, a sessions area for topic tables and open attendee discussion on many-to-many video calls, sponsor expo booths, chat rooms for each session and room, and more. We're really excited to see you there!
